verses.text_plain: The Lord reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.
verses.verse_html:
1The Lord reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof. ▼
▼ multitude…: Heb. many, or, great isles

footnotes.body_text: ▼ multitude…: Heb. many, or, great isles
footnotes.body_html: ▼ multitude…: Heb. many, or, great isles

verses.text_plain: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.
verses.verse_html:
2Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne. ▼
▼ habitation: or, establishment

verses.text_plain: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.
verses.verse_html: 3A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.

verses.text_plain: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.
verses.verse_html: 4His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.

verses.text_plain: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
verses.verse_html: 5The hills melted like wax at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.

verses.text_plain: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.
verses.verse_html: 6The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.

verses.text_plain: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.
verses.verse_html: 7Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.

verses.text_plain: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O Lord.
verses.verse_html: 8Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O Lord.

verses.text_plain: For thou, Lord, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.
verses.verse_html: 9For thou, Lord, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.

verses.text_plain: Ye that love the Lord, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.
verses.verse_html: 10Ye that love the Lord, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.

verses.text_plain: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.
verses.verse_html: 11Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.

verses.text_plain: Rejoice in the Lord, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
verses.verse_html:
12Rejoice in the Lord, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness. ▼
▼ at…: or, to the memorial

footnotes.body_html: ▼ at…: or, to the memorial
